mapper.select: SELECT emp_no empNo, emp_pw empPw, emp_name empName, emp_dept empDept, emp_grade empGrade, use_yn useYN FROM employee WHERE use_yn = (SELECT cd FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'A002' AND cd = 'Y') AND emp_no = #{strId}

SELECT outsourcing_no outsourcingNo, outsourcing_pw outsourcingPw, outsourcing_name outsourcingName, outsourcing_state outsourcingState, outsourcing_type outsourcingType FROM outsourcing WHERE use_yn = (SELECT cd FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'A002' AND cd = 'Y') AND outsourcing_no = #{strId}
SELECT gst_id gstId, gst_pw gstPw, gst_name gstName FROM guest WHERE use_yn = (SELECT cd FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'A002' AND cd = 'Y') AND gst_id = #{strId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commute_history( commute_no, emp_no, start_time, end_time, reg_time, mod_time, reg_id, mod_id, use_yn )VALUES( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(5), #{empNo}, NOW(), CONCAT(DATE(NOW()), ' 00:00:00'), NOW(), NOW(), #{empNo}, #{empNo}, 'Y' )
mapper.update: UPDATE commute_history SET end_time = NOW() WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND DATE(start_time) = CURDATE() AND HOUR(end_time) = 0 AND MINUTE(end_time) = 0 AND SECOND(end_time) = 0
mapper.select: SELECT start_time, end_time FROM commute_history WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND DATE(start_time) = CURDATE()
